fields.description: The date/time when the custom field was created
The user who updated the custom field, as described in <<userSummary,User Summary>>
The user who created the custom field, as described in <<userSummary,User Summary>>
A more detailed description of the custom field
Whether the custom field is active or not. Inactive custom fields are not displayed on their target objects
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The position the custom field will appear in a list of custom fields
The name of the custom field
The datatype of the custom field.
The date/time when the custom field was last updated

links.description: Resource listing options for the custom field. Will only be present if the custom field is of a type that supports options
